item.title: TaABCC3.2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaABCC3.2 Gene Name: ABC transporter C family member 3 protein 2 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Two variants of an ATP-binding cassette (ABC) family C transporter gene were cloned from DON-treated wheat mRNA, namely TaABCC3.
